name: Turbo Trouble
description:
Our submissions for the Weekly Game Jam week 73 themed "tunnel"

Ride through a tunnel filled with deadly obstacles and dangers and make it as far as you can!

Our first project for most of our team but it was a lot of fun and we learned a lot.

The game right now has a few problems like a missing title and some features we couldn't include but the game should play fine.

Credits: 

Walou(mathias veratoro) - Asset Artist

Cari - Asset Artist

Sigma - Coder

credit to https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/605884 for the music. <3

some unused assets
